video.title: China Revealed
video.synopsis: This documentary traverses China to reveal breathtaking landscapes and centuries-old historical sites unseen by most Western eyes.

episodes.synopsis: This episode traverses the 5,500-mile-long Great Wall of China, the largest man-made structure in the world, and reveals its centuries of secrets.
episodes.title: Great Wall

episodes.synopsis: One of China's most awe-inspiring landscapes, the Jiuzhaigou Valley is home to Tibetans who have turned its natural wonders into a land of meditation.
episodes.title: Jiuzhaigou

episodes.synopsis: The peak of Mount Huangshan, inspiration to countless artists and leaders over the millennia, is surrounded by mystery and legend.
episodes.title: Mt Huangshan

episodes.synopsis: The inspiration for Pandora in the film "Avatar," this spectacular region is home to deep winding valleys and towering rock columns.
episodes.title: Zhangjiajie

episodes.synopsis: This episode contrasts Wuzhen, an ancient town virtually untouched by progress, with Shanghai, the tiny trading post that's become a world-class city.
episodes.title: Shanghai and Wuzhen

episodes.synopsis: Like its fictional fantasy counterpart, this site in Yunnan Province is a breathtaking paradise of unspoiled cultural and natural beauty.
episodes.title: Shangri-La

episodes.synopsis: Home to monkeys, elephants and peacocks, as well as a variety of close-knit ethnic enclaves, this tropical Eden has remained unchanged for centuries.
episodes.title: Xishuangbanna

episodes.synopsis: Famed in story and song for two millennia, the Li River's beauty is eclipsed only by the wonder of the labyrinth of 3,000 caves that surrounds it.
episodes.title: Li River

episodes.synopsis: In the heart of the desert, the oasis of Dunhuang was once a pivotal trading stop on the Silk Road and a key fortification along the Great Wall.
episodes.title: Dunhuang

episodes.synopsis: For four weeks each winter, 18,000 artists descend on the town of Harbin to turn a barren, frozen lot into a wonderland of ice sculpture.
episodes.title: Harbin
